name: Beatzza
description:
Welcome to the Beatzzeria! It’s thyme to rustle up a Beatzza in this pizza topper sequencing toy. Pick, place and jam as your Beatzza takes shape. What toppings will you choose? 🍳Fancy one with only fried eggs? Eggcellent! 🍍 Pineapple? Are you sure!? 🌈✌️Give peas a chance or are you more Broc n Roll? 🥦🤘  Ok, ok… We’re going a bit ham with this, it’s getting a bit cheesy now 😎 

We can’t wait to hear what you cook up, share a slice of your Beatzza with us over on Twitter @ustwogames and use the hashtag #Beatzza ✨

Featuring:

🎨 Handmade 100% organic visuals

🔀 Shuffle button to pick between 18 ingredients 

🎶 Pitch buttons to transpose your tune up and down

🦉 Some cameos of ustwo sound effects from the past! 

Controls:

Use your mouse to drag and drop ingredients onto the spinning pizza. Placing ingredients at different distances from the centre of the pizza will change the pitch / sound which is played. To remove an ingredient from the pizza simply pick it up and drop it away from the pizza, there’s a pause button if it’s spinning too fast!
